headline.main: Cooking for Artists at the Robert Rauschenberg Foundation

docs.snippet: The institution’s first chef-in-residence, a French Laundry alum most recently located in Brooklyn, shares her photo diary of the experience....
docs.abstract: Pastry chef Shuna Lydon shares her experience cooking at Robert Rauschenberg Foundation in Captiva, Florida, where she has been chosen to be first chef-in-residence.
docs.lead_paragraph: The institution’s first chef-in-residence, a French Laundry alum most recently located in Brooklyn, shares her photo diary of the experience.
